verses.verse: That <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G746>beginning<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G191>heard<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G3708>seen<s%> with <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3788>eyes<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> we have looked <S%G2300>upon<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> have <S%G5584>handled<s%>, <S%G4012>of<s%> the <S%G3056>Word<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>;

<S%G2532>(For<s%> the <S%G2222>life<s%> was <S%G5319>manifested<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> we have <S%G3708>seen<s%> it, <S%G2532>and<s%> bear <S%G3140>witness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G518>shew<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> that <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> was <S%G5319>manifested<s%> unto <S%G2254>us<s%>;)

That <S%G3739>which<s%> we have <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> declare <S%G518>we<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> may <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> truly <S%G2251>our<s%> <S%G2842%G1161>fellowship<s%> is <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> we <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%>, we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> one with <S%G3326%G240>another<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G2511>cleanseth<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>.
